statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); transcript_path=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.transcript_path'); session_start=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.session_start // empty'); git_branch=$(cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo ''); calc_tokens_and_cost() { if [ -f "$1" ]; then chars=$(wc -c < "$1" 2>/dev/null || echo 0); tokens=$((chars / 4)); case "$2" in *"Opus"*) price_per_mtok=15;; *"Sonnet"*) price_per_mtok=3;; *"Haiku"*) price_per_mtok=0.25;; *) price_per_mtok=15;; esac; cost=$(echo "scale=4; $tokens * $price_per_mtok / 1000000" | bc 2>/dev/null || echo "0"); if [ -n "$3" ]; then now=$(date +%s); start_time=$(date -j -f "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S" "${3%.*}" +%s 2>/dev/null || echo $now); hours_elapsed=$(echo "scale=2; ($now - $start_time) / 3600" | bc 2>/dev/null || echo "0.1"); if (( $(echo "$hours_elapsed > 0" | bc -l) )); then hourly_rate=$(echo "scale=2; $cost / $hours_elapsed" | bc 2>/dev/null || echo "0"); else hourly_rate="0"; fi; else hourly_rate="N/A"; fi; if command -v bc >/dev/null 2>&1; then tokens_k=$(echo "scale=1; $tokens / 1000" | bc 2>/dev/null || echo "0"); if (( $(echo "$cost < 0.01" | bc -l) )); then cost_str="<$0.01"; else cost_str=$(printf "$%.2f" "$cost"); fi; if [ "$hourly_rate" != "N/A" ]; then hourly_str=$(printf "$%.2f/h" "$hourly_rate"); else hourly_str=""; fi; echo "${tokens_k}k|${cost_str}|${hourly_str}"; else echo "~|~|~"; fi; else echo "0|$0|$0/h"; fi; }; token_cost_info=$(calc_tokens_and_cost "$transcript_path" "$model_name" "$session_start"); tokens=$(echo "$token_cost_info" | cut -d'|' -f1); cost=$(echo "$token_cost_info" | cut -d'|' -f2); hourly=$(echo "$token_cost_info" | cut -d'|' -f3); base_dir=$(basename "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null || echo "~"); if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then if [ -n "$hourly" ]; then printf "%s | 📁 %s | 🌿 %s | 🪙 %s | 💰 %s | ⏱️ %s" "$model_name" "$base_dir" "$git_branch" "$tokens" "$cost" "$hourly"; else printf "%s | 📁 %s | 🌿 %s | 🪙 %s | 💰 %s" "$model_name" "$base_dir" "$git_branch" "$tokens" "$cost"; fi; else if [ -n "$hourly" ]; then printf "%s | 📁 %s | 🪙 %s | 💰 %s | ⏱️ %s" "$model_name" "$base_dir" "$tokens" "$cost" "$hourly"; else printf "%s | 📁 %s | 🪙 %s | 💰 %s" "$model_name" "$base_dir" "$tokens" "$cost"; fi; fi
